article_title: BBC names three Britons killed in Israeli strike on Gaza aid convoy.
sentence: BBC  names  three  Britons  killed  in  Israeli  strike  on  Gaza  aid  convoy.

article_title: BBC names three Britons killed in Israeli strike on Gaza aid convoy.
sentence: The  BBC  has  been  able  to  establish  that  the  names  of  the  three  British  aid  workers  killed  in  the  Israeli  air  strike  on  a  Gaza  aid  convoy  are  John  Chapman,  James  Henderson  and  James  Kirby.

article_title: BBC names three Britons killed in Israeli strike on Gaza aid convoy.
sentence: Other  foreign  nationals  among  the  seven  aid  workers  killed  came  from  Poland,  Australia,  Canada  and  the  US.
